LanguageData.Clear.label: Clear
LanguageData.Clear.description: A clear day. No penalties or modifiers。
LanguageData.Fog.label: Fog
LanguageData.Fog.description: Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons。
LanguageData.Rain.label: Rain
LanguageData.Rain.description: Rain reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire and slows people down。
LanguageData.DryThunderstorm.label: Dry Thunderstorm
LanguageData.DryThunderstorm.description: With the low water vapor and clouds rolling by, a dry thunderstorm is taking place. Vegetation is at a severe risk of catching fire。
LanguageData.RainyThunderstorm.label: Rainy Thunderstorm
LanguageData.RainyThunderstorm.description: The lightning will start fires but the rain will put it out. The rain also reduces movement speed and shooting accuracy。
LanguageData.Rainstorm.label: Heavy Rainstorm
LanguageData.Rainstorm.description: The lightning will start fires but the rain will put it out. The rain also reduces movement speed and shooting accuracy。
LanguageData.FoggyRain.label: Foggy Rain
LanguageData.SnowHard.label: Hard Snow
LanguageData.SnowHard.description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire and slows people down。
LanguageData.Blizzard.label: Blizzard
LanguageData.Blizzard.description: A blizzard is a severe snowstorm characterized by strong sustained winds. It will last for a prolonged period of time。
LanguageData.SnowGentle.label: Gentle Snow
LanguageData.SnowGentle.description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire and slows people down。
LanguageData.Fallout.label: Fallout
LanguageData.Whiteout.label: Whiteout
LanguageData.Whiteout.description: A whiteout is taking place so visibilty is severely reduced. Due to the snow, the use of ranged weapons is a very poor choice。
LanguageData.Hurricane.label: Hurricane
LanguageData.Hurricane.description: Extreme wind and a thick layer of clouds ravages the land. This renders ranged weapons nearly useless. Staying outside of shelter is nearly impossible。
LanguageData.NuclearWinter.label: Nuclear winter
LanguageData.NuclearWinter.description: Nuclear winter is the severe global-climatic-cooling-effect。
